mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_post ( post_type, category, title, content, writer_id, writer_type, branch_id, views, is_visible, post_visible, sport_type, recruit_max, recruit_datetime, recruit_end_date, display_start, display_end, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{postType}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{writerType}, #{branchId}, 0, 1, 1, #{sportType}, #{recruitMax}, #{recruitDatetime}, #{recruitEndDate}, #{displayStart}, #{displayEnd}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT post_id AS postId, post_type AS postType, category, title, content, writer_id AS writerId, writer_type AS writerType, branch_id AS branchId, views, is_visible AS isVisible, post_visible AS postVisible, sport_type AS sportType, recruit_max AS recruitMax, recruit_datetime AS recruitDatetime, recruit_end_date AS recruitEndDate, display_start AS displayStart, display_end AS displayEnd, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM community_post WHERE post_type = 'COMMUNITY' AND is_visible = 1 AND post_visible = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT post_id AS postId, post_type AS postType, category, title, content, writer_id AS writerId, writer_type AS writerType, branch_id AS branchId, views, is_visible AS isVisible, post_visible AS postVisible, sport_type AS sportType, recruit_max AS recruitMax, recruit_datetime AS recruitDatetime, recruit_end_date AS recruitEndDate, display_start AS displayStart, display_end AS displayEnd, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM community_post WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND post_visible = 1
